answers.answer: Yes, thirst is common. But it also means dehydration. When you get thirsty like that, drink water, not yoohoos lol. You have to drink even more water than you did before pregnancy. At least 2 liters a day.
Yeah, I bring a liter of cold water next to my bed because the thirst gets real lol, my husband calls me a camel for drinking so much water at night haha.
Oh I got a gallon of water beside the bed lol but I was just craving a yoohoo lol. Idk where that craving came from all of a sudden

Oh okay haha well good! How far along are you?? Have you been checked for gestation diabetes?? Extreme thirst even when hydrated is sometimes a sign of that. But it could just be weird pregnancy changes!

They said I tested negative for diabetes. But I'll be 22 weeks tomorrow. I think it was just a random craving for the night lol its the only night I've really gotten up to get a drink unless it's when my boyfriend gets up to get ready for work

question: Ok do I just woke up a few minutes ago to go to the bathroom well I came and laid back down trying to get back to sleep well all of a sudden I felt extremely thirsty, so I went to the fridge and got a cold yoohoo and before I even made it back to the bed room it was gone! Do any of you other moms to be get that way at night time?
title: thirsty
